plays.text: Goal scored by Travis Green assisted by Robert Reichel and Gary Roberts
Penalty to John Emmons 2 minutes for Interference Curtis Joseph
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for Elbowing Jamie Rivers
Penalty to Travis Green 2 minutes for Interference Sergei Samsonov
Goal scored by Jonas Hoglund unassisted
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Crosschecking P.J. Axelsson
